intros REV; inv REV; auto.

fileSamples.statement: (cond : condition) (args : list valnum) (res res' : bool) (H : combine_cond' cond args = Some res') (H0 : eval_condition cond (map valu args) m = Some res) : res = res'.
fileSamples.conclusion: res = res'
fileSamples.hypotheses: (cond : condition) (args : list valnum) (res res' : bool) (H : combine_cond' cond args = Some res') (H0 : eval_condition cond (map valu args) m = Some res)
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold combine_cond' in *.
destruct cond; inv H; destruct args; inv H2; destruct args; inv H1; destruct args; inv H2.
apply (combine_comparison_cmp_sound valu c v v0 res res'); auto.
apply (combine_comparison_cmpu_sound valu m c v v0 res res'); auto.
apply (combine_comparison_cmpl_sound valu c v v0 res res'); auto.
apply (combine_comparison_cmplu_sound valu m c v v0 res res'); auto.

fileSamples.statement:
(cond : condition) (args : list valnum) (res res' : bool) (H : match cond with
| Ccomp c | Ccompu c | Ccompl c | Ccomplu c =>
    match args with
    | nil => None
    | x :: nil => None
    | x :: y :: nil => combine_comparison c x y
    | x :: y :: _ :: _ => None
    end
| _ => None
end = Some res') (H0 : eval_condition cond (map valu args) m = Some res) : res = res'.
fileSamples.conclusion: res = res'
fileSamples.hypotheses:
(cond : condition) (args : list valnum) (res res' : bool) (H : match cond with
| Ccomp c | Ccompu c | Ccompl c | Ccomplu c =>
    match args with
    | nil => None
    | x :: nil => None
    | x :: y :: nil => combine_comparison c x y
    | x :: y :: _ :: _ => None
    end
| _ => None
end = Some res') (H0 : eval_condition cond (map valu args) m = Some res)
fileSamples.proofString:
destruct cond; inv H; destruct args; inv H2; destruct args; inv H1; destruct args; inv H2.
apply (combine_comparison_cmp_sound valu c v v0 res res'); auto.
apply (combine_comparison_cmpu_sound valu m c v v0 res res'); auto.
apply (combine_comparison_cmpl_sound valu c v v0 res res'); auto.
apply (combine_comparison_cmplu_sound valu m c v v0 res res'); auto.

fileSamples.hypotheses: (args' : list valnum) (r : val) (n : int) (x : valnum) (H0 : eval_operation ge sp (Oxorimm n) (map valu (x :: nil)) m = Some r) (m0 : int) (H7 : get x = Some (Op (Oxorimm m0) args')) (H : combine_op get (Oxorimm n) (x :: nil) = Some (Oxorimm (Int.xor m0 n), args')) (v : val) (H1 : Val.xor v (Vint m0) = valu x)

rewrite <- H0.
simpl.
rewrite <- H1.
rewrite Val.xor_assoc.
auto.
